questions.text: What song was Carla listening to when she first arrived at Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Sun in the Morning.

	Carla was singing and dancing as she worked. However, when she saw Rebecca and Woody coming down the steps she unplugged the machine. Rebecca said, "Good morning, Carla" and Carla replied, "What's so good about it?" "Sun in the Morning" was written by Irving Berlin for the musical "Annie Get Your Gun".

questions.text: What were Rebecca and Sam arguing over?
questions.correct: Whose last name the baby will get
options: What gender the baby will be
questions.explanation:
Whose last name the baby will get.

	When Rebecca asked what was wrong with her name, Sam said it was a question not a name. (Her last name is Howe). He then picked on her name, but when Rebecca tried to pick on the name Malone she couldn't do it.

questions.text: Did anyone in the bar think that Sam and Rebecca should have a baby?
questions.explanation:
No.

	They thought that they should be married first. Some think they hadn't thought it through enough because babies were hard work.

questions.text: What did Sam say that taking care of Carla's kids would prove?
questions.correct: You can survive in the wild.
options: You could be a police officer.
questions.explanation:
You can survive in the wild.

	Rebecca started having second thoughts about having a baby with Sam. They decided to watch someone else's child(ren) to see how they'd do. Frederick's schedule was full so Rebecca said they'd watch Carla's kids.

questions.text: Who first filmed Woody with Kelly for Woody's parents?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff didn't like anything they do. He got so bad he had Woody in tears.

questions.text: Who told Rebecca she was spending the night with her boyfriend?
questions.explanation:
Seraphina.

	Seraphina was played by Leah Remini. She went on to have a successful career with the show "King of Queens".

An 8 foot boa constrictor.

	Lud was crying because he couldn't find him. While saying grace Rebecca felt something under her foot. She looked under the table to find it was the snake. (The snake was not shown to the audience however).

questions.text: Where was Carla going to stay?
questions.explanation:
The Ritz-Carlton.

	Frasier mentioned to Lilith about their stay at the Ritz-Carlton. She replied, "We've never stayed at the Ritz-Carlton."

questions.text: How many takes on scene 1 did the first filmer take on Woody and Kelly?
questions.explanation:
58.

	Woody and Kelly told Cliff they didn't want to do a tape. Frasier took over filming, but he was almost as bad.

questions.text: Did Sam and Rebecca make it to the kids' bedtime?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Rebecca had a meltdown at one point, but they did it. They then heard, "be afraid", and being afraid Rebecca said she hoped it was a prowler.
